file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 74-13-01-04 - IGNITION EXCITER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL IGNITION EXCITER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/Install the ignition exciter. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH engines. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 74-13-01-000-801-A IGNITION EXCITER - REMOVAL ALL 74-13-01-400-801-A IGNITION EXCITER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 74-13-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-13-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. IGNITION EXCITER - REMOVAL A. General (1) To remove the ignition exciter, obey the instructions in the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower cowling LH engine 423 Lower cowling RH engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine exciters 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THE ENGINE START/STOP SWITCH IS IN THE “STOP” POSITION TO PREVENT AN ACCIDENTAL ENGINE OPERATION. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – POWERPLANT START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 74-13-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: THE IGNITION SYSTEM VOLTAGE IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH AND CAN KILL OR CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS. MAKE SURE THAT THE IGNITION SYSTEM IS SET TO OFF FOR A MINIMUM OF SIX (6) MINUTES, BEFORE YOU START THE WORK ON THE IGNITION SYSTEM COMPONENTS. (1) Remove the ignition exciter. Refer to the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 74-13-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-13-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. IGNITION EXCITER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To install the ignition exciter, obey the instructions given in the latest revision of the Rolls- Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower cowling LH engine 423 Lower cowling RH engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine work area I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the ignition exciter. Refer to the latest revision of the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 74-13-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • POWERPLANT START 1/2. (2) Remove the workstand. (3) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 74-13-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
